bibl.title: How Power and Province Communicate: Some Remarks on the Language of the (Non-)Conversation between Pilate and Jesus.
bibl.note: [Introduction.] - Provincial Language: How Much Greek Could an Average Galilean Speak? [see pp. 170-172: Galilee in the Hellenistic Period. Text and translation of P. Col. Zenon I, 2.] - Powerful Language: Exclusion of the Other [with evidence from Greek papyri]. - Who's Powerful and Who's Powerless? - Conclusion.
